info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on Product entity associated with your Azure API Management deployment. The Product entity represents a product in API Management. Products include one or more APIs and their associated terms of use. Once a product is published, developers can subscribe to the product and begin to use the productâ€™s APIs.

get.description: Lists a collection of products in the specified service instance.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| terms | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| state | filter | eq |     |</br>| groups | expand |     |     |</br>

parameters.name: expandGroups
parameters.description: When set to true, the response contains an array of groups that have visibility to the product. The default is false.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Products which are part of a specific tag.

200.description: A Collection of the Product entities for the specified API Management service instance.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the product specified by its identifier.

200.description: Specified Product entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the product specified by its identifier.

200.description: The response body contains the specified Product entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Product was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Product was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: deleteSubscriptions
parameters.description: Delete existing subscriptions associated with the product or not.

200.description: Product was successfully removed.

204.description: Product was successfully removed by previous request or does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists a collection of the APIs associated with a product.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| description | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| serviceUrl | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| path | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The response body contains a collection of Api entities in the product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Checks that API entity specified by identifier is associated with the Product entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Adds an API to the specified product.

201.description: The API was successfully added to the product.

200.description: The specified API is already added to the product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified API from the specified product.

200.description: API was successfully removed from product

204.description: API successfully removed by previous request or does not exist in product

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the collection of developer groups associated with the specified product.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt |     |</br>| displayName | filter | eq, ne |     |</br>| description | filter | eq, ne |     |</br>

200.description: Lists a collection of Group entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Checks that Group entity specified by identifier is associated with the Product entity.

204.description: The Group is associated with the Product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Adds the association between the specified developer group with the specified product.

201.description: The group was successfully associated with the product.

200.description: The specified group is already associated with the product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the association between the specified group and product.

200.description: The group was successfully disassociated with the product.

204.description: The group was successfully disassociated with the product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the collection of subscriptions to the specified product.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| stateComment | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| ownerId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| scope | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| userId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| productId | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| state | filter | eq |     |</br>| user | expand |     |     |</br>

200.description: Lists a collection of subscription entities.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the Product level.

200.description: Product Policy information.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Get the ETag of the policy configuration at the Product level.

200.description: Product Policy Etag information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get the policy configuration at the Product level.

200.description: Product Policy information.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates policy configuration for the Product.

201.description: Product policy configuration was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

200.description: Product policy configuration of the tenant was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the policy configuration at the Product.

200.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the Product level.

204.description: Successfully deleted the policy configuration at the Product level.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all Tags associated with the Product.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |     Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>| displayName | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>| name | filter | ge, le, eq, ne, gt, lt | substringof, contains, startswith, endswith |</br>

200.description: The operation returns a collection of tags associated with the Product entity.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state version of the tag specified by its identifier.

200.description: Empty response body, ETag header entity state version.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get tag associated with the Product.

200.description: Gets the details of the tag specified by its identifier.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

201.description: Tag was assigned to the Product.

200.description: Tag is already assigned to the Product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Detach the tag from the Product.

200.description: Successfully detached the tag from the Product.

204.description: Successfully detached the tag from the Product.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
